author: tng
msg: 1. Name Xerces features as XMLUni::fgXercesXXXX instead of XMLUni::fgSAX2XercesXXXX so that they can be shared with DOM parser.

author: tng
msg: DOM L3: Add the flag fNormalizeData so that datatype normalization defined by schema is done only if asked.

author: tng
msg: DOM L3: add the flag fCreateCommentNodes and create comment nodes only if asked.

author: tng
msg: DOM L3: Not to deviate from the spec, DOMBuilder::parseXXX methods should not take reuse as parameters
Similar to SAX2XMLReader, reuse flag should be set through setFeature.
Besides add non-standard extension set/getProperty for setting the schemalocation property.
